label: Facility
comment: Represents locations where products are manufactured or stored

label: has address
comment: Links an entity to its address

label: has name
comment: Links an entity to its name

label: has contact information
comment: Links a supplier to its contact information

label: has location
comment: Links a facility or supplier to its geographical location

label: has certification status
comment: Links a supplier to its certification status

label: supplies
comment: Links a supplier to a material they supply

label: Material
comment: Represents raw materials used in manufacturing

label: located in
comment: Links an entity (supplier or facility) to its geographical location

label: produces
comment: Links a facility to a product they produce

label: has date
comment: Links events (supply or production) to dates

label: has batch size
comment: Links a production event to the batch size

label: has quantity
comment: Links a supply event to the quantity supplied
